name: Chair Simulator 3
description:
You thought I was done? Well, I'm sorry to bring you pain...

ONE MORE TIME! Chair Simulator 3: The Chairing (not actual title)

After 2 games made with pure love and passion, expectations were high. How could I surpass the amazing sitting of the first game or the walking of the second? I realized, then and there, the answer was obvious...

COMBINE THEM.

Here we are. A brand new Chair Simulator, with brand new kick-ass soundtrack from Rolemusic. Please don't sue me. I'll follow your CC stuff and put your links here or something like that:

Rolemusic - Omou matsu (Title Screen Theme) - http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/~/Omou_matsu

Rolemusic - The River (Bedroom Theme) - http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/~/The_River_1161

Enjoy the third installment in the trilogy of the gods. (Not actually endorsed by any god, but looking for sponsors. Hit me up, gods.)
